title: Mercury Transit in the 4th House for Capricorn Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 4th house for Capricorn Ascendant, thoughts turn inward toward home, family, emotional security, and foundational decisions. You become more analytical about domestic matters, property, and long-term stability. Conversations at home increase, and planning related to real estate, vehicles, or education is favored. However, overthinking or emotionally detached communication can disturb peace. Balance is achieved by combining practical thinking with sensitivity, allowing clear decisions without weakening emotional bonds or inner calm.

sections.title: Career
points: Planning work from a stable base
Support for real-estate or admin roles
Avoid carrying domestic stress to work

closing: This Mercury transit helps Capricorn Ascendants think clearly about their foundations. Sensitivity keeps logic from disturbing inner peace.
